name: Hunter Run
description:
Hunter Run! Run & Shooting RPG!
Collect 12 heroes and clear various challenging stages!
You can create unique heroes with many great costumes!
Play diverse contents including Quests, Raid, Tower of Dead, and Defense Battles.
